entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet exec` and `dotnet run` fails to run if a dependency has a non default file extension #34775

Closed

  • dotnet-watch has a dependency on ASP runtime, despite being a CLI-only tool. #34777

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2247839 #34778
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • I noticed a copy issue in another PR which may be related to the reference here that shouldn't be necessary. #34768
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add ProjectCapability for Native AOT properties. #34485
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [wasm] Remove `UsingMicrosoftNETSdkBlazorWebAssembly` from Wasm SDK #34166
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
